content:
My name is Markus Peschl. Currently, I am a Master’s student of Applied Mathematics at the Delft University of Technology. On the theoretical side, my research interests lie in probabilistic models, stochastic processes and their applications to reinforcement learning.
As a consequence, I am mainly interested in the study of uncertainty quantification for sequential decision making, Bayesian deep learning and optimal planning in (partially observable) Markov decision processes.
summary: My name is Markus Peschl. Currently, I am a Master’s student of Applied Mathematics at the Delft University of Technology. On the theoretical side, my research interests lie in probabilistic models, stochastic processes and their applications to reinforcement learning.
title: Markus Peschl
